extends AbstractRecordMapper

                       int[] fieldsLength,
                       java.lang.String[] fieldNames)
        Create a FixedLengthRecordMapper instance.
        Parameters:
        recordClass - the target domain object class
        fieldsLength - an array of fields length in the same order in the FLR flat file.
        fieldNames - a String array representing fields name in the same order in the FLR flat file.
